name: Clockwerk
title: Rattletrap
lore: Rattletrap descends from a line of inventors. His clockwork exosuit bristles with traps, rockets, and blades.

batterAssault.name: Battery Assault
batterAssault.description: Releases mini-shrapnel at nearby enemies, dealing damage and mini-stunning them.

powerCogs.name: Power Cogs
powerCogs.description: Creates a ring of cogs around Clockwerk that knock back and drain mana from enemies.

rocketFlare.name: Rocket Flare
rocketFlare.description: Fires a global-range rocket that reveals the targeted area and damages enemies.

hookshot.name: Hookshot
hookshot.description: Fires a grappling hook that latches to the first enemy hero, pulling Clockwerk and stunning them.
